title: Design reference modular hardware stack v1
description:
Create first reference hardware module design following modular architecture principles. This includes:

1. Select core compute module (Raspberry Pi vs custom SoC)
2. Design audio module (DAC/ADC selection, clocking)
3. Design control module v1 (rotary encoders, buttons, LEDs)
4. Define power distribution system
5. Create mechanical reference design (enclosure, mounting)

Deliverables:
- Complete BOM for all modules
- KiCad schematics for each module
- Firmware reference implementation
- Mechanical CAD files
- Integration test procedure

Priority: High - establishes baseline for all future hardware

title: Generate C++ header from Control Registry JSON schema
description:
Create tooling to generate C++ header files from the control-registry-spec.md JSON schema.

Requirements:
1. Parse JSON schema definitions
2. Generate C++ struct definitions
3. Generate validation functions
4. Generate constexpr control ID constants
5. Add to build system (CMake)
6. Create unit tests for generated code

Deliverables:
- JSON-to-C++ code generator tool
- Generated control_registry.h header
- Validation tests
- Documentation for adding new controls

Priority: Medium - enables type-safe control access across firmware and engine
